name: Roy Tang
text: Chiko Tiongson I'm sorry, but there's not much to write about in terms of planning lol. We literally booked the flight and set the budget and that's about it. For the daily itinerary we just decided one day at a time. We only finalized the countries to visit on the first day of the trip :p As for the budget, I believe my personal total came out to around P130k for the entire trip, which was around 14 days (+2 days travel)
